column7: A plant from a different world where everything is made up from pixels.
A pretty little part of a star. It is said you can wish for these in a different dimension.
A sweet little treat. Can be used to make more sweets.
Leaves. They look pretty much dead.
Eww...Like why is this even on sale?
Usually roasted over a campfire with scary stories.
Freshly picked apples from someone's backyard. Don't tell.
Strawberries which were left longer under the sun but it is hard to tell a difference.
I wonder how they even got these...
A beautiful flower which can be found in many gardens.
Most people would prefer 'grated moon cheese'.
It feels like a sin to own.
Makes great tea to become sleepy... (Yawn)
A completely normal mushroom. Yeah, normal.
